document.docAuthor: Yakovlev, Roman V., Pljustch, Igor G., Skrylnik, Yuriy, Pak, Oleg & Witt, Thomas J.
document.masterDocTitle: The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park

subSubSection.paragraph:
Schawerda, 1924
: 161âˆ’162 .

Type species:
Phragmatoecia (sic) reticulata Pungeler, 1900
. Designation by monotypy.
Type locality: Dascht bei Chorog (Schugnan) [ Tadzhikistan , Khorog]. Type material: holotype (male) in ZMKU , examined.

* Phragmacossia territa
(Staudinger, 1879 ) (
Figs 60
, 119 )

Phragmatoecia territa Staudinger, 1879 : 341
â€“342.
Type material: Laterne im Kerasdere [ Turkey ].
Type material ( syntypes ) in MHUB , examined.

Material examined:
1 male
, prov. Kadaghan, Salang pass, 2400 m , 11 âˆ’ 12.07.1971 , leg. Vartian ( MNHW ).

Phragmacossia micromaculata Yakovlev, 2009
(
Figs 61âˆ’62
, 120 )
Phragmacossia micromaculata Yakovlev, 2009 : 356
.
Type locality: Afghanistan , 25 km N Barikot, 1800 m , Nuristan. Type material: holotype (male) in MWM , examined.
Distribution: Afghanistan .
Habitat and biology. Flight period: July. Altitude: 1800 m .

Material examined:
4 males
( holotype and 3 paratypes ), 12 .â€“ 17.7.1963 , Afghanistan , 25 km N Barikot, 1800 m , Nuristan, Kasy & Vartian ( MWM GPrMWMâ€“ 9263 and MNHW ).

)
Type locality: Afghanistan , Paghman, 30 km NW v. Kabul.
Type material: holotype (male) in MNHW , examined.

1 male
, Hindukush, Paghman Mts., 3000 m , 6 .0 7.1973 , leg. Flauger ( MWM ).

Phragmacossia bandeamiri Yakovlev, Pljustch, Skrylnik & Pak
